summary: This code snippet is a brief description of the "Kacket" project, which is a Racket/Scheme code analyzer written in Kotlin. It provides basic information about its purpose and the programming languages it supports for analysis.

details.comment: This code snippet is a brief description of the "Kacket" project, which is a Racket/Scheme code analyzer written in Kotlin. It provides basic information about its purpose and the programming languages it supports for analysis.
details.content:
# Kacket
A toy Racket/Scheme code analyzer written in Kotlin.
